TopicTitle: Woohoo! A new challenge for the 'Whack!

Articles.Content:
Teh Lolbster of KSP streamer fame and I are gonna have a little contest. In one week's time, we're going to build the biggest thing we can that actually FITS inside the VAB. Winner will go by weight in orbit? I think? No parts clipping permitted, aside a little engine clustering if needs be. So there will be no tanks inside tanks inside tanks.

I have already begun... find enclosed a screenshot of a test launch of mine.

/mysterious Whackjob is mysterious
Holy....is that an artificial Kerbol?

unrelated to this post whack, but when you try landing an asteroid, you should provide it with a heat shield made of panels or something. do not allow re-entry effects to touch the asteroid as it might chemically change its surface. start with an a or b i would say.

Holy....is that an artificial Kerbol?

I don't know what it is, but I think it's about to attack the Enterprise.

Now build mecha-Jool! xD

I'm impressed already.
Good luck, careful you don't destroy the launch platform; I hear those are a PITA to rebuild.
Glad you're back, Whackjob.
This is exactly what the Times Square ball drop should look like. Nice to see you back. Don't turn this PC into rubble so quickly.
Well, if i find info in daily news about freak firestorm raging somewhere, should i presume your CPU finally reached thermonuclear fusion temperature and exploded into a ball od plasma?

It is good to be back! Even better, back with some new toys!

Work in progress. Got a setup I kind of enjoy, and went to do a staging run. Ran fuel out until first stage was done. Gotta redo fuel lines though... outside ring ate some fuel it shouldn't have.

LOL!
It's....It's... GOING SUPERNOVA!!! D:

... hey look, Whackjob is back.

Ã‚Â¿Ã‚Â¿Ã‚Â¿WHACKJOB IS BACK???

RUN! TAKE COVER! NO WHACKJOB, DONÃ‚Â´T TOUCH THAT BUT...

Uhoh. Here comes the Whack-Nova!

Anyway, i'm intersted to see what it creates...
Actually I just realized, it reminds me of the attempt at making fusion using 100 or so lasers.
The Wack is back

I have already begun... find enclosed a screenshot of a test launch of mine.

http://i.imgur.com/Q1w3X7n.png

/mysterious Whackjob is mysterious

I think I just came 3 years closer to being blind.
Nice build Whackjob. This should be an interesting contest.
Godspeed, Whackjob. May your processor survive the immense physics calculations that mine cannot.

"'Splosions are the sprinkles on your ice cream sundae....." Jeb:cool:
What's next? Deathstar? In full scale? :|

I've got a pic like that.

Not quite as impresive as Wack's though.

The Whack is Back!

EVERYONE RUN...

What's next? Deathstar? In full scale? :|

That wouldn't fit in the physics radius.

A Star Destroyer could though...
